metadata.synopsis: The emperor speak to the players if they are near his former hideout at Elfsong Tavern's Cellar
metadata.how_to_trigger: Be near the door of the cellar's entrance at Elfsong Tavern. Once a tadpoled player enters the zone, will receave this AD.Bookmark: larian://bookmark?mod=GustavDev&level=BGO_Main_A&camPos=-1714.304077;56.134640;694.906738&camTarget=-1713.972412;55.412399;694.299805

0.text: The cellars are just down the stairs - there you'll find my old lodgings.
